nameEntry.part: University of Alberta. Office of the Associate Vice-President (Academic Administration)

biogHist.p: The office coordinates and administers academic personnel matters; applies and interprets regulations on benefits; assists in salary negotiations and in standing committees involving promotions and tenure of academic staff and in selection and review committees of senior officers (Deans and Directors). Associate Vice-Presidents: 1978- Brian Hugh McDonald.
